title: The next champion, will it be a Support?
body:
I feel like the next new champion that is coming up and I just want to know if it's a Support champion. I feel bad for being a main support player because there is not much support champions to pick and other roles has more selection of picking champions.
I look forward for the next Support champion that can protect and heal allies.
SUPPORT FOREVER! :)
SUPPORT RULES!

replies.body:
Shameless self promotion but I came up with an idea for a supporting champion that is quite unique mechanics wise (at least to me) and is very good for controlling the flow of combat.

You can find him [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/wiLun0sU-champion-suggestion-yen-the-zen-master).

theres tons of support with tons of different supporting roles to be played, but yes a new supp champ would be nice.

BRING ON ANOTHER HOOK MECHANIC KEK

There are 21 pure support champions.

if you add the tanker off-support champs like Maokai/Malphite the number rises to 32

if you add all the mage wannabe supports like Annie/Lux/Vel'Koz/Brand then the number goes to 48

thats 48 possible picks for support. theres only 38 mages, 44 top laners, and 20 ADC's

the way i see it, support has the most possible champs?


But i would like the next champion to be a good fun support too.

My guess is a top laner.

Support is cool though and can be very fun.
